h6_verdict.note: Positive d = honest has HIGHER effective rank (wider representational space). This means deception narrows dimensionality — null space expansion.

h1_verdict.interpretation: DECEPTION has unique cache signature (distinct from both honest and confabulation)

h3_verdict.interpretation: UNCERTAINTY distinguishable from DECEPTION in cache

h4_verdict.interpretation: Deception signal DISTRIBUTED across layers (H4 rejected)
